titleStmt.title: Partridge's advice to the Protestants of England.
titleStmt.author: Partridge, John, 1644-1715.

notesStmt.note: In verse. First line of text "Now, to your cost, you see with grief and tears,"; first line of first stanza - "Touch't with a teeming strain of English growth,".
Place and date from Wing (CD-Rom, 1996). Other suggested dates of publication 1682 and 1687, with the latter based on British Library Sloane ms. 2281.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
